basics.name: Alexander Rios
basics.label: Backend Developer specialized in Golang and Java, Spring Boot
basics.summary: Junior Backend Developer specialized in Golang and Java. I have built everything from a passwordmanager to cybersecurity tools and APIs, using technologies like Spring Boot, Fiber, and Gin. My expertisealso extends to AWS and containerization with Docker, which enhance the development projects andoperational efficiency. Passionate about cybersecurity and proficient in Bash/Shell scripting, I skillfullymanage various Linux distributions. My commitment to continuous learning drives my professional growthin the dynamic tech landscape.
